document_data.mainbody:
eese the Burrower was a wererat of the Riverside Rats gang, who dwelt in the Wheloon Prison of Cormyr during the late 15 century DR.
As a wererat, Neese had brown fur.
Neese lived in Wheloon Prison with her fellow wererat gang. They were forced from their hideout by the Night Brigade under Storna Harnwood, who turned it into a Temple of Shar. After being driven to the exterior of the prison where the Purple Dragons made their base, Neese helped organize a counterattack with the surviving Rats, specifically targeting the enemy officer Karissa the Knife, who made a habit of dwelling underground and hoarding treasure. Thanks to Neese, Karissas hideout in the Wheloon sewers was found and the greedy Master Thief killed.
